title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

Ken Matthews fills in for Rush on Wednesday. There IS positive economic news. Blue Angels flyover. Information shift at daily briefing. Trump explains bailouts, media spins it. LA Lakers loan. Why do runners always look angry? Homeschooling issues and Common Core. Livestock industry in danger. Joe Biden joke machine shielded by Twitter. YouTube bans. 1st Amendment being challenged. SNL wishes it had Trump’s humor.  

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

Small businesses vs. Gov. Tom Wolf. Joe Biden accuser. Stacey Abrams, what happened to every women should be believed? Alyssa Milano weighs in. Katie Couric on why people watch the news, and it’s not for information. Congressman Scott Perry joins the show to talk supply chain, China, and quarantine book recommendations. Caller questions Made in the USA.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

Stock market gains. America is always improving. Investigating the reaction to the virus. Bringing structure back to our youth is super important. Pence hospital mask spin. Jimmy Kimmel, the useful idiot. The media has failed us. Biden allegation and Hillary.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
